title: Portraits XI
text:
her
flesh
Came
at

meassandca V
             ingint
                      oA
chute

      i had cement for her,
      merrily
we became each
other humped to tumbling

garble    when
a
minute
pulled the sluice

                 emerging.


concrete
seo_description: A poem by E. E. Cummings in “&”
